column4: it depends on how you're sources.list file is set up, and if the package you want is even on the disc.
yeah, but most people use a working internet connection (like the one you're using to talk in this irc channel)
i'm not on ubuntu at the moment, my wifi works fine on windows since it has the drivers.
i think nickrud is more aware of what you're wanting, i'd listen to him, not me
